definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc

sentences.english: Why not climb Qingyuan Mountain this weekend?
sentences.chinese: 這個週末幹麼不去清源山玩呢？

sentences.english: What can the farmer use his idled land for, if anything?
sentences.chinese: 如果可能的話，農民可將其閒置的土地用來幹麼？

sentences.english: Try doing that with the monitor sitting on your desk right now.
sentences.chinese: 你試試你面前的顯示器能這麼幹麼？

sentences.english: If you can imagine, then why don't do it right now?
sentences.chinese: 如果可以想像，幹麼不現在就做呢？

sentences.english: So what's this about community superiority?
sentences.chinese: 那它幹麼說什麼社羣的優越性？
